title: Kings of Lust
description: I thought the fight was over.That I’d finally found a home for me and my family. That I’d found a new beginning.How wrong was I?All my efforts just led me to a new beginning of the end.Echo City was on the verge of destruction, and my plan of trying to stop the unstoppable involved all three of them.The three Kings.Forming the most dangerous union.Deadlier than ever before.Hungrier than ever before.Darker than ever before.And as all kings, they offered nothing for free, each one demanding the price of my body in return, continuing their devious games, gradually breaking me.Passionate, mesmerizing, and wicked, forming a dark alliance to conquer it all. Including me!The three devils united into a sinful team.Kings of Lust!Kings of Lust is a dark college bully reverse harem romance and is Book2 of The Pleasure Room series.This book contains material that may be sensitive to some readers and it's addressed to a mature audience.No angels allowed between these lines, no Prince Charming, just sinful desires.The Kings of Lust is not recommended for the weak of heart or for those who are looking for a perfect love story. This book is dark, twisted, pushing boundaries and imagination.With three different kings, this book has it all: dystopian romance reverse harem, reverse harem mafia dark romance, reverse harem academy bully dark romance, dark reverse harem royal romance.Please, read the trigger warning inside the book!This is the kind of book you hide under a pillow when someone comes into the room.The correct order:Kings of DesireKings of LustEnjoy!
author: M.O. Absinthe
